title: Vitha Vithama Soap Seeppu Kannadi Lyrics Kaadhale Nimmadhi
stanzas: <div>Vitha Vithama Soap Seeppu Kannadi Lyrics Kaadhale Nimmadhi

Vidha vidhamaa
soapu seeppu kannaadi
en akkaa maga vandhu
ninnaa munnaadi

en akkaa ponnu anjala
naan vachchen paaru nenjula
naanga rendu perum pinjula
ada engayum poyi konjala

Vidha vidhamaa
soapu seeppu kannaadi
en akkaa maga vandhu
ninnaa munnaadi

oru naal margazhi maasam
kaalangaathaala ava
veettu munnaala

kaalaiyil ezhundhu
kolam podugaiyila
kadhula soundu kaettu
naanum ezhundhenda

ava enna paaththaa
naan avala paaththen
kannum kannum muttikichu
kadhal vandhu ottikichu

Chennai Managarile
south usman roatile
lalitha jewellariyil
neclace vaangi thandha
bagavan kadaiyila
cut piece-u vangithandhen
kannula alaveduthu
jocketu vaangithandhen
devi theatrela
kadhal kottai padam paarthen

ava enna thotta
naan avala thodala
kannum kannum muttikichu
kadhal vandhu ottikichu

Vidha vidhamaa
soapu seeppu kannaadi
en akkaa maga vandhu
ninnaa munnaadi

en akkaa ponnu anjala
naan vachchen paaru nenjula
naanga rendu perum pinjula
ada engayum poyi konjala
